function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of copper-incorporated construction products and elements.","Impact":"Potential decrease in contamination and spread of pathogens.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of copper materials.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings and biocides.","People":"Occupants of buildings, maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance companies."},{"Description":"High maintenance costs of copper materials.","Impact":"Increases the financial burden of building maintenance.","Mitigation":"Budgeting for maintenance costs, exploring alternative materials.","Technologies":"Cost-effective maintenance techniques, alternative antimicrobial materials.","People":"Building owners, property managers.","Owner":"Building owners, property management companies."},{"Description":"Combining plastics with antimicrobial substances like copper, silver, and zinc.","Impact":"Potential resistance to virus multiplication and spreading.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of antimicrobial surfaces, monitoring for effectiveness.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings and biocides, cleaning protocols.","People":"Occupants of buildings, maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance companies."}]}
